full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Notice Title**: Acquisition of HPE 3PAR – StoreServ 6700 Storage Systems
**Contract Reference Number**: SSC-23-00021440
**Amendment Number**: 0
**Publication Date**: January 12, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: January 18, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
**Tender Status**: Expired

## Background
The Government of Canada's Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement to procure HPE 3PAR – StoreServ 6700 storage systems to support the current storage infrastructure at legacy data centers.

## Tender Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Raiyane Benchekroun
	+ Email: raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (613) 324-4061

## Submission Requirements

* **Final Closing Date for Submission**: January 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Bidder Inquiries**: Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to the above contact information.

Attachments can be downloaded from [this link](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/D16C379A-068C-4061-A27D-F4CF2010D8DF) (English) or [this link](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/6EBFDC72-AECB-4A1E-9A01-EC3F55B14EEA) (French).

Note that the tender has expired, and no further submissions will be accepted. If you have any inquiries or further information, please contact the provided contact information.
